akn:section.akn:heading: Agreements on aircraft sabotage, aircraft hijacking, and airport security

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 44910. Agreements on aircraft sabotage, aircraft hijacking, and airport security The Secretary of State shall seek multilateral and bilateral agreement on strengthening enforcement measures and standards for compliance related to aircraft sabotage, aircraft hijacking, and airport security. (Pub. L. 103–272, § 1(e), July 5, 1994, 108 Stat. 1212.)
